1.text: Rinse your hair thoroughly with warm water.

2.text: Condition your hair before you shampoo if you have long hair.

3.text: Gently massage shampoo into the roots of your hair.

4.text: Do not shampoo the ends of your hair if you have longer hair.

5.text: Rinse your hair and squeeze out the excess water.

6.text: Evenly spread conditioner into your hair if it is less than 3 inches long.

7.text: Apply conditioner on the midsection and ends of your hair if you have longer hair.

8.text: Leave the conditioner in your hair for 10 minutes after your shower if you have longer hair.

9.text: Rinse your hair with cool water if you have long hair.

10.text: Use a leave in conditioner or hair mask.

11.text: Buy shampoo and conditioner for normal hair if your hair is shorter than 3 inches.

12.text: Thicken the volume of your hair if you have fine, limp or oily hair.

13.text: Strengthen your hair with protein based shampoos if you treat your hair.

14.text: Find a shampoo to soften and tame your hair if you have coarse or curly hair.

15.text: Use creamy shampoos if you have dry or frizzy hair.

16.text: Rotate the kind of shampoo you use if you have dandruff.
